Articles.Content:
Hello, i am a new user that got the game 3 days ago, and i got hooked! it is awesome! i can fly rockets! AWESOME! i can crash! AWE.. wait that is not awesome.

Anyways, hello everybody in this forums! yay! somehow find it hard to reach the Mun but meh.

SORRY IM TOO EXCITED

also, can someone tell me how i change my avatar? D:

Thanks

Bubbles!

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear that you've clearly been enjoying the game very much. I know the Mun seems like a daunting objective right now, but with time, patience, and practice (and maybe the assistance of a few of the tutorials collected in the Drawing Board; see the convenient link in my signature) I'm sure you'll get there eventually. Be sure to let all of us know when you do!

As for the avatar: New users go into a special "Curious George" user group that puts certain restrictions in place on forum activity. Basically, until you've been vetted as "not a spambot" by the system, us moderators have to manually evaluate your posts, and certain privileges such as custom avatars and signatures are disabled. Once you've had ~3-5 posts and we're sure you're human, you'll be released from these restrictions and free to post without interference. See our handy New User FAQ for more details.

Hope this helps, and hope you enjoy your time on the forums!

My, my, somebody's excited!

i can fly rockets! AWESOME! i can crash! AWE.. wait that is not awesome.

But crashing is the most awesomeness-y part!

Hello!

My, my, somebody's excited!

But crashing is the most awesomeness-y part!

Hello!

hello!

Keep in mind... If something explodes hard enough, parts of it may go to space!

Good luck on your missions!
